doc.name: PtidesPlatformContents
doc.description: This is a specialized composite actor for use in PtidesPlatform. In particular, it ensures that if ports are added or deleted locally, then corresponding ports will be added or deleted in the container. That addition will result in appropriate connections being made.
doc.property: This boolean parameter defaults to false and indicates whether the timestamp in the recordtokens sent and received by network ports are model time or real time.
